ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectOrder No. 154 - (Alberta) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NÂ° 154 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of ALBERTA with respect to the RAINSTORM that affected the province, from July 7 to 10, 2011.
